title: Ozone Deodorizer Home Air Purifier
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (10-12 Days)


Ozone Deodorizer Home Air Purifier

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy a 30-day money back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Material: ABS

Color: White

Rated Voltage: AC220V, 50 Hz

Rated Power: 5w

Anion: 1000w

Nominal Noise: 33dB

Practical Area: ≤50m2

Oxygen Production: 100 mg / hour

Formaldehyde Removal Rate: ≥99.3

Sterilization and Deodorization: ≥99.9

Staphylococcus Mortality: ≥99.95

Maximum Sterilization Range: 30 square meters

Dimensions: (length) x (width) x (height) 198x118x40mm / 8x5x2 inches (approximately)

Plug: We will send the corresponding adapter plug according to your country

 

Operating mode

1. Turn on the power and touch the "On / Off" button to turn the machine on and off (the mode indicator flashes to indicate that the machine is running, and when the mode indicator is always on, it is in standby mode)

2. With the power on, press the Mode button to perform a pn cycle. p2.p3.p4 mode selection

P1 mode: The ozone o3 runs for 2 minutes, then stops for 1 hour, and starts the cycle mode. The negative ion 02 runs for 10 minutes, then stops for 20 minutes, and then starts cycling.

Suitable for pet rooms smaller than 5 square meters, family bathroom

P2 mode: The ozone o3 runs for 15 minutes, then stops for 24 hours, and starts the cycle mode. The negative ion 02 runs for 30 minutes, then stops for 30 minutes, and starts the cycle mode

Suitable for rooms, kitchens and bathrooms with an area of ​​less than 10 square meters

P3 mode: The ozone o3 runs for 30 minutes, then stops for 12 hours, and starts the cycle mode. Negative ion 02 runs for 30 minutes, then stops for 2 hours, cycle mode starts

Suitable for living room, bedroom, bathroom with an area of ​​more than 20 square meters

P4 mode: The ozone o3 runs for 30 minutes, then stops for 2 hours, and starts the cycle mode. Negative ion 02 runs for 30 minutes, then stops for 2 hours, cycle mode starts

Suitable for high-speed space purification with an area of ​​more than 30 square meters

[Features]

Small size and easy to use

Efficient and fast purification to provide you with fresh air

New environmentally friendly Abs material, textured body

Not only suitable for bathrooms, but also widely used in hotels, guest rooms, entertainment rooms, living and event spaces for the elderly and vulnerable children

Installation method

1. Find the best installation place for the machine "disinfect-or" and avoid children's operation

2. Please reserve the "sterilizer installation location", wash the reserved location with water, and do not leave water and dirt on the wall

3. After tearing the label from the wall and holding it for 2-3 minutes to make the product firmly adhere to the wall

4. Connect the power cord and the on / off button is blinking 5. Touch the "On" button to turn on the machine and select the desired mode

Details

Patio 3-Piece Bistro Set Woven-Rope Conversation Set with Wood Tabletop and Cushions for Balcony, Gray Rope+Beige Fabric

 

Selling Points:

Aluminium Frame // Woven Rope // Acacia Wood Chair Legs // Acacia Wood Tabletop // Storage Shelf under Top // Zippered Cushion&Pillow // 12-month Warranty

Bullet Points:

Portable Patio Set

This seating set includes 2 armchairs,1 tea table, 2 pillows and 2 cushions. With a sleek silhouette, you can create a relaxing meeting place in your balcony or patio for your friends or loved ones. The shelf under the tabletop provides extra storage space. Each piece is lightweight for easily storing and transporting but also with reliable capacity. 330lbs for each chair and 150lbs for the table.

Sleek Woven-Rope&Wood Frame

Quality aluminum frames and all weathered woven rope make the bistro table and chairs durable enough for long time use. With a slatted acacia wood top table and chair legs, the natural brown color offers an extra charming looking including better sturdiness with an adjustable pad on each leg.

Soft Cushions&Pillows

With these 2.8-inch thickness water-resistant cushions, extra comfort will be offered with an ergonomic back and arm. Due to zippered cover, all of the cushions and pillows can be washed by machine and hand-washing is still strongly recommended for longevity.

Versatile Usage

Nice try for both indoor and outdoor. The image put it in the poolside, your backyard, garden, balcony, or deck to have leisure time. Wherever you want to relax, this set will be a good choice for you.

title: Patio Furniture Rattan Style Patio Beverage Cooler Bar Table
body_html:
Highlights

Elevate your next gameday party. This portable bar table allows your guests to grab chilled beverages while never being far from any of the action.

Lid elevates upwards 10 inches above the rim for use as a patio bar table. The top reveals a hidden cooler with 7.5-gallon capacity. Keep up to forty 12 oz. cans ice cold.

When not being used as a party bar, shut the top and use as a patio coffee table. When elevated, it is the ideal height for use as a hot tub table so you will always have a spot for your drink, snacks, and phone.

Unlike real rattan and wicker, the thick exterior resin prevents rusting, peeling, and denting in all weather conditions, rain, or shine.

Built in drainage plug makes cleanup a breeze. After the party is over and the ice is melted, simply pull the plug to drain the cooler and let it dry before putting it away until next time.

Details

Specifications

Table design: End Table

Product Dimensions: 19.5"D x 19.5"W x 33.2"H

Room Type: Kitchen

Color: Grey/Brown

Style: Contemporary

 

 

Key Features

OUTDOOR BAR TABLE: Elevate your next gameday party. This portable bar table allows your guests to grab chilled beverages while never being far from any of the action.

 

POP UP BAR & HIDDEN COOLER: Lid elevates upwards 10 inches above the rim for use as a patio bar table. The top reveals a hidden cooler with 7.5-gallon capacity. Keep up to forty 12 oz. cans ice cold.

 

VERSATILE USE: When not being used as a party bar, shut the top and use as a patio coffee table. When elevated, it is the ideal height for use as a hot tub table so you will always have a spot for your drink, snacks, and phone.

 

ALL-WEATHER-RESISTANT: Unlike real rattan and wicker, the thick exterior resin prevents rusting, peeling, and denting in all weather conditions, rain, or shine.

 

EASY CLEANUP & LOW MAINTENANCE: Built in drainage plug makes cleanup a breeze. After the party is over and the ice is melted, simply pull the plug to drain the cooler and let it dry before putting it away until next time.

 

 

Illustrate

Light shooting and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little different from the real thing. Please refer to the actual product. The measurement allowed error is +/- 1-3cm.

Unshipped Items Return Policy

35 % restocking fee will be charged for unshipped item returns without valid reason within 30 days of the original order being processed.

 

Shipped Items Return Policy

For quality or other issues, the Buyer can request a refund or reshipment within 7 days after the end customer has received the item. The reshipment fee will be borne by the Seller.

 

*Warranty:  

1. For any product problems, you must provide communication vouchers, pictures, videos, etc. with the seller.

2. If the product is returned to the overseas warehouse due to the wrong address, no refund will be given.

3. No reason to return any non-product problems, such as the following wrong order, wrong purchase by customer, customer dislike, etc.

4. Please contact the online customer service before returning the product for a refund, otherwise the return will not be refunded.

5. Items must be unworn, undamaged and in original packaging.

 

Note:

Dropshipping to 48 states in the United States. Some remote states in the United States (short code: PR, HI, VI, AE, AP, AK, GU, AS, MP) do not provide a drop shipping service for the time being.

Highlights

10 FT Solar LED Patio Outdoor Umbrella Hanging Cantilever Umbrella Offset Umbrella Easy Open Adustment with 32 LED Lights

The modern design was created to fit seamlessly in areas such as outdoor seating spaces for patio, garden,office buildings, restaurant and commercial businesses.

32 LED Lights with 8 steel ribs help to light up relaxing night. The square solar panel at top can work for 6-8 hours when battery is in full status. The built-in battery will be charged during daytime by the provided solar module.

The 180G polyester canopy fabric features fade resistant, water repellent, highly UV-resistant that can last for many years.

Hand crank design allows opening & closing the umbrella with little effort. It is even easy to use for kids and the elderly.

Description

This is a product that has sun-proof function and sturdy construction with 32 solar LED lights. Even on the sunniest day, you can enjoy your outdoor living spaces and remain cooler by using this Patio Sun Shading Umbrella. It is probably the best way to stay outside without absorbing the harmful UV rays of sun, which causes serious sunburns or even skin cancers.

At the same time, it is a perfect choice when there is time that rain spotting and you still want to enjoy outdoor scenery and cool breeze.And when the sun falls, eco-friendly & energy-efficient solar powered LED lights with Upgraded solar panel makes it romantic and warm to enjoy night scenery also besides sun shading needs in the day.

 

Classic High-End Patio Umbrella

Large and opulent, our offset umbrella complements your outdoor space with its wide arching canopy and elegant iron framework. The modern design was created to fit seamlessly in areas such as outdoor seating spaces for patio, garden,office buildings, restaurant and commercial businesses.

32 Solar LED Lights

32 LED Lights with 8 steel ribs help to light up relaxing night. The square solar panel at top can work for 6-8 hours when battery is in full status. The built-in battery will be charged during daytime by the provided solar module.

Fade-resistant Canopy

The 180G polyester canopy fabric features fade resistant, water repellent, highly UV-resistant that can last for many years.

Sturdy Construction

The rust-free center steel pole with 8 ribs provides the most stable support. So it has superior wind-resistance.And the pole, ribs and crank handle are also powder-coated for enhanced rust-resistance and long-lasting outdoor use.

Convenient Crank System

Hand crank design allows opening & closing the umbrella with little effort. It is even easy to use for kids and the elderly.

Wind Vent

It has an air vent at the top to stop the wind pulling the parasol upwards. It also helps to keep you cool when you're sitting beneath the canopy while adding extra stability.

Easy to Assemble and Storage

It is easily set up and store away. Clear instructions are included with information on how to assemble and care for the umbrella.

title: Polar Plush Sherpa Fleece Throw Blanket
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (5-7 Days)



Polar Plush Berber Sherpa Fleece Throw Blanket




We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy a 30-day money back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy. 

 

 

 

 

 

Color:

Snow Leopard

 

 

 

Features:

  • PERFECT FOR COUCH POTATOES, COUPLE'S, SNUGGLERS & KIDS - ANY COUCH, ANY BED CAN TRANSFORM INTO: A warm snugly oasis of comfort with our fleece blankets. Not to mention that any piece of furniture can instantly be uplifted with a personal, stylish touch of color choice ranging from grey, beige, blush, teal, diamond blush, Greek teal, plaid blue or faux fur snow leopard or fox.
  • REVERSIBLE 2 WAY TEXTURE: ONE SIDE IS FLUFFY SHERPA, THE OTHER FABULOUS SMOOTH MINK OR FAUX FUR. After hearing the requests of thousands of our past customers, we delivered a product that combines the best of both comfort world - Mink and Sherpa. Now Couples, Kids and Anyone can enjoy the surface they prefer.
  • THICKER THAN A CLOUD: PURE SOFTNESS - We heard about people complaining against our competitors on how thin, cheap, and flimsy their blankets were... NOT HERE. Our Berber/Sherpa Throw Blankets pack in the fluff to make sure you're kept warm OR you can use it as a pillow or head prop.
  • JUST TOSS IT IN THE WASHER - IT'S SO FRUSTRATING: When silky soft blankets shed or get matted after 1 wash! NEVER WORRY about that happening with our Premium Throw Blanket. We specifically engineered durable, micro stitched fibers that can withstand even the most robust cleaning. Ensuring clean, mink softness all they day long WITHOUT SHRINKING.
  • DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY - OUR DURABLE MATERIAL IS BUILT TO LAST: WHILE OTHER COMPETITORS SACRIFICE: Durability due to their cheaply made synthesized materials and manufacturing processes, we ASSURE YOU our Sherpa blankets won't shed on you or expose loose threads because inspect every throw blanket before we ship it out. Any problems? TELL US! And we'll send you a FRESH ONE.

 

 

 

 

Details:

WE FOCUSED ON FLUFFINESS

Why do you want this throw blanket? That is easy, you VALUE COMFORT. But not just standard coziness, you want the best, and we created it. Forged with incredibly precise microfibers, we took the term SILKY-SOFT to a whole new level. What sets us apart is not only our stitching process, but also the actual material of the mink and shaggy long fur. It is safe for the skin and NOT synthesized, but also incredibly supple to the touch.

 

 

Don't Worry About Pet Fur

We know how annoying it is to stand up from a nice, comfortable relaxing nap only to find your behind is COVERED in your furry friend's winter coat. You don't like it when pet hair sticks to your pants OR blankets and neither do we! That's why we made our silky soft texture static electricity resistant, MEANING PET HAIR IS NOT DRAWN TO IT.

 

 

 

WASHING INSTRUCTIONS:

Throw it in the wash

Throw in the dryer on low tumble

Pull it out and rub it on your face (just as soft as brand new)

Your Welcome

 

 

 

Versatile for ANY Furniture Arrangement:

Whether you fold up and arrange our fluffy blankets on couches, beds, sofas or recliners, either way your furniture style will become ENHANCED.

 

 

Choose from our DIVERSE ASSORTMENT of neutral and bold color options:

Solid Beige

Solid Grey

Solid Blush

Solid Teal

Blue Plaid<

Green Teal

Diamond Blush

Fox Pattern (Faux Fur)

Snow Leopard Pattern (Faux Fur)

 

 

 

ANY PROBLEMS, WE HAVE GOT YOUR BACK

We believe and stand by the quality of our products. If you need assistance or find there was in issue with your plush blanket, then just contact us and we will make it right!

title: Police Officer Pet Costume
body_html:
IMPORTANT: Measure your pet to ensure proper fit.

  • Measure body: Measure the base of the neck to the base of the tail.
  • Measure neck: Measure around your pet’s neck leaving a bit of wiggle room.
  • Measure chest: Measure your pet’s chest around the widest part.

Compare measurements to the product size chart listed. Sizing may vary between other styles- always be sure to compare measurements to each products size chart for the perfect fit.

In between sizes? We always suggest going up a size.
tags: All Dog Costumes, costume, dog, Occupational, officer, pet, police, puppy, XXL & XXXL Dog Costumes

body_html:

Hand-made Polyester Cotton Woven Storage Basket 

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy a 30-day money back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

Color: Navy & Off-White

Features:

  • LARGE ROUND BIN - 15X16" with O-ring and cardboard bottom to reinforce shape and give structure, simply collapse bin and store when not in use.
  • STURDY ROPE HANDLE - Reinforced cotton rope handles make for easy and comfortable transporting and sturdy bottom retains shape after each use.
  • STYLISH FOR ANY ENVIRONMENT - These bins are available in fun, trendy and adorable styles and colors, a perfect addition to a nursery, home office, craft room, or to add a splash of color to any room while also being functional.
  • ORGANIZATIONAL SOLUTION FOR THE HOME - Find a place for knick-knacks, children's' toys, magazines, craft supplies, and more with these sturdy, everyday bins that can be tucked away in closets, side tables, under beds, in storage cubes, or on a shelf.

Release Date: 13-02-2018

Details: Take Back Your Space with DII Storage Bins

Polyester storage bins are a fun and creative way to organize and store toys, clothes, blankets, towels, books, knick-knacks and more. Tired of clutter in the kid's room, living room, or laundry room? These storage containers could be the perfect solution to organize the clutter while enhancing your home’s décor.

These trendy bins have become very popular due to their simple yet chic look and dependability. Sturdily constructed these storage bins are up to the task of being carried to-and-fro, used to transport groceries, laundry, or household goods these bins will handle it. The material and construction offer a long-lasting bin that you can use over and over again.

Make Your Décor POP

Get creative with fun designs and colors that are easy to mix and match with an assortment of sizes, colors, and patterns. Bring color and interest to a dull room with vibrant hues and a sophisticated look while also adding functionality. These trendy bins have become very popular due to their simple yet chic look, versatility, and dependability.

Solid Construction

Built to last these bins are reinforced with an O-ring and cardboard bottom to give shape and structure, simply collapse bin and store when not in use. Sturdy cotton rope handles make for easy and comfortable transporting and the cardboard bottom retains shape after each use. The material and construction provide a long-lasting bin that you can use over and over again.

So Many Great Options

DII offers delightful Home & Kitchen products including a large selection of table linens, aprons, and dishtowels but for more storage options search: DII Storage or click the DII link at the top of the page to start exploring our other collections.

Our Storage Products Include: • Underbed Storage • Closet Storage • Metal Utility Storage • Metallic Lurex Bins • Burlap Storage • Polyester Storage • Cube Organizer Storage

title: Pool Garden Patio Portable Zero Gravity Folding Reclining Lounge Chairs Table 3 Pieces Set
body_html:
Highlights

This patio recliner set is an ideal choice to have a nap in the hot summer or even hold a party.

The steel frame of the patio lounge is powder coated and is equipped with anti-skid footpads. Therefore, it has sturdy construction with great stability for long time use. The maximum load withstanding capacity of this zero-gravity chair is 310 lbs. As a result, you get enhanced stability and safety

The use of premium fabric makes this lounge chair durable and weather-resistant. Hence, you will never feel sultry even in the midst of summer with the breathable fabric. It is a perfect addition to outdoor spaces. Better support is further provided by the removable head pillow and curved armrests.

This zero-gravity chair is upgraded with a reclining locking system operated through a rotary knob. Moreover, the folding table with 2 mesh cup holders is able to provide ample space to place different items on it. Bottles and snacks are some of such items.

The portable chairs and side tables are foldable to a suitable size. Thus, they occupy less space for storage. Compact design combined with its lightweight makes it a convenient set to store in narrow space for storage and or transportation.

Details

Specifications:

Color: Black/Beige/Navy/Gray                                                                    Material: Steel, textilene fabric

Overall dimension: 26.0" x 39.5" x 44.5" (L x W x H)                                  The folding size of table: 26.0" x 20.0" x 3.0" (L x W x H)

The folding size of chairs: 37.5" x 26.0" x 5.5" (L x W x H)                          Net weight: 38 lbs

Weight capacity: 220 lbs                                                                             Package includes:  2 x Chaise lounge    1 x Portable folding table

 

Key Features:

Heavy Duty Construction: The steel frame of the patio lounge is powder coated and is equipped with anti-skid footpads. Therefore, it has sturdy construction with great stability for long time use. The maximum load withstanding capacity of this zero-gravity chair is 310 lbs. As a result, you get enhanced stability and safety.
Comfortable Sitting Experience: The use of premium fabric makes this lounge chair durable and weather-resistant. Hence, you will never feel sultry even in the midst of summer with the breathable fabric. It is a perfect addition to outdoor spaces. Better support is further provided by the removable head pillow and curved armrests.
Ergonomic Tilt System and Practical Table: This zero-gravity chair is upgraded with a reclining locking system operated through a rotary knob. Moreover, the folding table with 2 mesh cup holders is able to provide ample space to place different items on it. Bottles and snacks are some of such items.
Foldable Design for Convenience: The portable chairs and side tables are foldable to a suitable size. Thus, they occupy less space for storage. Compact design combined with its lightweight makes it a convenient set to store in narrow space for storage and or transportation.
Easy Cleaning and No Assembly: This 3 pieces lounge chair and table set require no assembly as they're shipped assembled by default. Similarly, the maintenance required is also considerably less due to the premium fabric and steel material. As a result, it helps you to save a lot of time.

 

Description

This patio recliner set is an ideal choice to have a nap in the hot summer or even hold a party.

 

The cool and breathable fabric keeps you away from sultry feeling even during summer days. The waterproof and sun resistant performance makes it the best possible furniture set for outdoors. Made of a solid steel frame, both lounge chairs and tables can be used for a long time. The adjustable design with a locking system is a plus for enhanced comfort.

All in all, it takes advantage of the body's gravity to generate comfort and relaxation. Isn’t that amazing? Widened armrest and soft head pillow provide yet another level of comfort and support to your whole body. The practical folding table in this set lets you place drinks and snacks on it and 2 mesh cup holders prevent any spilling disaster. Most importantly, this patio lounge chair set is light in weight and foldable but sturdy enough to support a high load. Last but not the least, it's easy to store and move from one place to the other.

 

If you are looking for a patio recliner set like this, don't hesitate to buy one!

 

Brand new and high quality

Steel tubes construction, durable and sturdy

Ergonomic design to reduce muscle tension and stress and enable you to recline in total comfort

Incline and adjustable back to fit your body

With the folding feature, easy to store and save space

Locking system allows you to lock the chair in any position

Table with 2 cup holders for convenience

Lightweight and easy for transporting

Good choice to relaxation, relief, sleep, entertainment

Fits for beach, deck, yard, and room

Description

The washing machine has a powerful cleaning function and a clear operation panel, making you clear all kinds of dirty clothes quickly.

 

The portable compact washing machine which only needs a small space to store is a perfect solution for compact living. Equipped with a variety of convenience features, it includes a see-through lid, electronic controls with LED display, stainless steel inner tub and 2 water pipes. The max weight capacity of this washing machine reaches 9.92Lbs, which is very suitable for you doing medium weight laundry. In addition, this machine features a built in drain pump and a drain pipe which allow you to easily drain out dirty water. With this laundry washing machine, you will find washing is an easy job.

 

If you are looking for such washing machine, don't hesitate to buy it now!

Portable Electric Blender Bottle

Common Questions:

 

1. What's the difference between ordinary juicing cup and this one?
Magnetic absorption charging, vacuum preservation, easy to carry and keep the freshness and taste of juice.

 

2. How long can the vacuum state last? How many times can I vacuum at full charge?
The vacuum degree of - 30KPa can be maintained for 4 hours under the vacuum condition (the vacuum can be recycled), and the juice can continue to be vacuumized and fresh-kept after drinking. Under the negative pressure, the oxidation speed of the juice will be delayed and the juice can be vacuumized more than 700 times at full power.

 

3. Can a juicing cup be used to grind meat and make ice?
You can beat ice, you can't grind meat.

 

4. How long does it take for the juice cup to be fully charged and how many cups can be squeezed when it is fully charged?
2 hours, 25 cups at full power. According to different environments and juices, there will be different differences. The specific results shall be subject to the actual measurement.

 

5. Is machine cleaning convenient?
It's very convenient. The machine can not only clean automatically, but can also wash all over with water.

3) Level three --High Temperature{107-131℉/42-55℃}

 

How to Use?

1. Heat Mode (With Red Light)

1) Press the power button and hold for 3 seconds, you can see the RED-LIGHT on, then it will pre-heat.

2) Press button once to change the temperature mode. There are 3 modes for getting more heat, and the temperature will rise gradually with the red light on.

3) Then press button and hold for 3 seconds to quit the heat mode.

 

2. Battery Mode (With Blue Light)

1) Press the power button, the BLUE LIGHT shows the battery capacity.

2) If you see the Blue light is still on after quit the heat, it is a normal condition. The Blue light will fade away in 20-30 seconds

 

3. Other Functions:

This disinfection box is suitable for mobile phones below 6 inches, and it also compatible with gloves, mask, socks and other small clothing, tableware, baby toys, travel toothbrush, jewelry etc.

Automatic power Off
Once the box is closed, it becomes a closed space. If the lid is open during disinfection, the UV lamp will extinguished immediately and automatically power off, which will not bring light stimulation to the users.

USB Powered
The sterilizer is powered by the Micro USB cable which can shared with electronic devices such as mobile phones.

Portable Design
The sterilization box has a simple but exquisite appearance, small size and lightweight, easy to storage or carry.

Wide Applications
It is perfectly ideal for home, office, hotel, traveling, business trip etc.

If we may, would you care for some special bath sheets? We created them just for you, so you can experience a SPA-LIKE quality in your own home--with a PLUSH and SUPER SOFT feeling on the skin without the heft and bulk. They are infused with SUPER ABSORBENT properties to effectively dry your body and hair. Towels, themselves, DRY QUICKLY to RESIST MILDEW and ODORS.

Allow us to share how to EASILY CARE for these special towels. Recommend washing separately to prevent collecting lint or debris from other garments and textiles. Please hand or machine wash in warm water with like colors and air dry or dry on the low setting. Recommend using wool dryer balls to reduce any static when drying. We ask you not use fabric softener, bleach, dryer sheets or the towels may become less special. Can also launder in a laundry bag to keep separated from mixed loads and away from debris.

Recommend using towels to pat dry your body and not wipe dry.

  • A perfect gift for a multitude all occasions: No matter who is receiving it or for what occasion. A Premium Roses box can be a prefect fit for your Mom, Dad or significant other.
  • Customer satisfaction guaranteed: We follow Amazon’s policy that includes a 14-days free return.

 

Details:

Premium Roses - Roses with Longevity!

These breathtaking, real preserved roses will add 365 days of elegance to any room! We choose only the most beautiful flowers for our arrangements. You will receive a stunning box bouquet that will impress, and be admired by the recipient.

 

 

Preserved Rose Box Features:

  • Exquisite 1 year Roses

  • High-Quality, Eco-Friendly Display Box (our boxes are 70% recyclable)

  • Designed for Any Occasion

  • Customizable Gift Card Option

  • One Day Delivery Available in the US

 

 

Perfect For:

  • Wedding Centerpieces & Decor
  • Birthdays, Special Events, Graduations, Housewarming, Anniversaries, Valentines Day, Mothers Day, or any day!

 

 

Care Instructions:

Because these live roses have gone through a special preservation process, they do not require much, if any, maintenance - there are just a few things to be mindful of in order to keep your roses looking their best for 365 days.

  • Handle with care, as the flowers are delicate.
  • Do not water - this will limit their shelf life.
  • Avoid touching the roses often - moisture from your skin can diminish the shape and color of your roses.
  • Keep your roses at a temperature of 65-77 F degrees, avoiding direct sunlight.
  • If dust collects on flowers you can lightly blow dry or soft brush.

 

 

Rose Symbolism:

Roses are often given as a symbol of love, but can also have different meanings if chosen by color for their specific sentiment.

 

  • Red - Love & Romance
  • Yellow - Friendship
  • White - Innocence & Purity
  • Pink - Grace, Gratitude, Joy & Admiration
  • Orange - Enthusiasm & Passion

No matter the reason for gifting these beautiful blossoms, they are a wonderful way to brighten anyone's day!

12.8 x 7.6 x 6.1 inches

title: Premium Weathered Bronze Wall Fountain
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (5-9 Days)

 

Premium Weathered Bronze Outdoor Wall Fountain

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color: Napoli - Weathered Bronze

Features:

  • ✔ DIMENSIONS: 27" Tall x 18" Wide x 10" Deep - WEIGHT: 12lbs - COLOR: Weathered Bronze
  • ✔ QUICK AND EASY out of the box set up - Perfect water feature for outdoor, gardens, backyards, decks, patios and porches.
  • ✔ DURABLE light-weight cast resin and fiberglass wall fountain - Hand finished by skilled artisans
  • ✔ MOUNTS against any surface using a sturdy hook, screw, or nail. - 2 gal
  • ✔ LOW MAINTENANCE variable speed recirculating UL listed pump included - 105 GPH - Plugs into regular electrical outlet

Details: The Napoli Wall Fountain features gentle curves and an inspirational ocean shell design. Water flows tranquilly from the elongated downspout into the shell-shaped mid-bowl. This bowl produces three peaceful streams of water flowing onward to the reservoir below creating a soothing sound that is sure to enhance any outdoor environment.

Bring the look and feel of the Old World home to your world today. Follow the included Quick Set up Instructions to complete water fountain set up in just minutes. Included is a quiet, powerful, adjustable-flow submersible water pump that plugs into any regular electrical outlet. Simply attach the easy-to-set up pump, fill the basin with water and plug it in to enjoy the serenity of flowing streams of water.

Designs are based in elements of nature with realistic polyresin that reflect environments from forested timberland, low grasslands, deserts, to high alpine peaks. Providing you with prime quality home, yard, and garden decor. We stand behind our brand and the quality of the items we sell with a money back guarantee.

We will send new parts, or, as outlined in out product warranty, a replacement/refund if you're not absolutely thrilled with your fountain.

 

Helpful Tips for Fountains 

● Use the pump regulator to adjust flow to your liking. 

● Check and tighten all electrical connectors at set up.

● Maintain water level so the pump remains fully submersed at all times. More arid climates may evaporate water sooner than humid environments.

● The submersible pump is constructed to screen out debris from the water and should be checked and cleaned periodically to maintain premium performance. 

● To ensure proper flow of water over the feature, slightly adjust the horizontal level of the fountain as needed. 

● For longevity, drain, cover/store fountain during wintertime (freezing).

 

Package Dimensions:

29.5 x 20.1 x 12.5 inches

  • SIMPLE ASSEMBLY: Hangers allow you to put the picture on any desired wall or a flat surface. Metal hooks and pads are attached to the back of the picture so that there's enough space between the item and the surface - it creates an additional 3D impression.
  • DURABLE AND FLEXIBLE: Acrylic glass, unlike traditional glass, is very durable and flexible - it lasts for a very long time.
  • IT LETS LIGHT THROUGH: Thanks to the fact that acrylic glass prints let light through easily, the pictures have an interesting shine and keep the colors intense and bright.
  • BREAK-RESISTANT: Acrylic glass does not break that easy, which makes it safe for children.
  • MIRROR LIKE SMOOTH SURFACE: The surface of an acrylic glass picture is as smooth as glass and it's also scratch-resistant.
  • DECORATION: Catches the eye! Perfect for all modern graphic & photographic designs. Makes every wall look better. Glossy glass like effect.
  • EUROPEAN QUALITY: The products are made in our own manufacturing facility from beginning to end

Binding: Kitchen

Details: Acrylic glass print is a very interesting alternative to traditional pieces of decoration. It's also a perfect addition to almost all types of interior designs. Hangers and pads placed on the back side allow you to hang the picture without any difficulties.

When the picture is already on the wall, there's space between the item and the surface, so it creates an additional 3D impression. Modern print techniques and high quality inks will catch every eye.

The surface of the picture is humidity-resistant, so it's also easy to clean. If the picture consists of more than 1 part, please make sure there is 2-3 cm distance between the panels so that the pattern matches up well. All our products belong to the Artgeist.

Details

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

***Generation 2 model Raldey Carbon AT All terrain electric skateboard***

Introducing the all-new redesigned Raldey Carbon AT 2nd generation. After years of testing with the first generation, we have made three main improvements to our new second generation. 

 

1. we tweaked and improved our existing Hobbywing ESC, which now comes with 20% more power. The second generation reaches speeds of 45km/h (28 mph) with the 195mm (7.5 inches) wheels, powered by two 6368 belt motors of 1500 Watts each.

 

2. The second update we made was mounting our two belt motors behind the board. This makes the board look much more aggressive also protects them from diverse terrains. Our airless wheels of 165mm (6.5inches) and 195mm (7.5 inches) are comfortable and require much less maintains compared to traditional pneumatic wheels. Now you don't need to worry about popping a tire while offroading on your favorite trails. Also, they sit on 254mm (10-inch) double kingpin trucks.

 

3. The final update our team made was adding a new honeycomb design foam grip tape. This small feature improves the comfort of our carbon fiber decks. The deck is comprised of Japanese T700 carbon fiber for a lightweight and sleek setup for the electronics and battery enclosure.

 

Warning: 

The Raldey Carbon AT 2nd generation is very powerful. Wear a helmet and proper protection at all times. Serious injury or even death can occur if the rider is misusing this product and not wearing proper protection. Have fun and stay safe!

Note: The Board & remote cannot be fully charged for shipping, so please charge the Board & Remote fully to experience the full potential of the Raldey.

Details: Our Dragon's Blood Soy Spell Candle is the perfect solution for those of you who wish to tap into the magickal energy of the resin. Of course, we always make sure to add real Dragons Blood resin into our candles to ensure you are getting the real magickal properties. Dragon's Blood is considered to be one of the most effective ingredients for a variety of different types of rituals and intentions particularly for those that focus on Love, Power, Purification, Protection and Passion! Although Dragons Blood can come from a variety of sources, it its most commonly derived from the Dracaena Draco palm tree found in Sumatra and the surrounding Malayan Islands. Historically it was used in funerary rites and served as a powerful embalming agent. There is some folklore that suggest Dragons Blood even has the power to enable shape shifting. Our Dragons Blood Soy Candle is made from 100% natural soy. It comes in a 6 oz jar. To perform your favorite spell or ritual, write down you petition on a piece of paper. Then fold the paper in half, folding the paper towards you. Then turn it 90 degrees and fold it in half again/ Make sure you get it as flat as you can/ Then place your Dragon's Blood Candle on a plate. Place the plate directly over your petition. When ready, say a prayer or your choice or you can read Psalm 23. Warning: To prevent fire and serious injury, always burn candle within sight. Keep away from drafts and keep away from children and pets. Never burn a candle near anything that can catch fire.

Hybrid Walnut Wood Classic Sunglasses

A modern approach to timeless design, our hybrid walnut wood classic sunglasses combine locally sourced, sustainable American Black Walnut wood with eco-friendly acetate frames for a pair of shades that will put you on the cutting edge of style.

FEATURES

  • 1Locally sourced, 100% real American Black Walnut Wood Temples with eco-friendly acetate frames

  • 3Stainless steel flex hinges for superior comfort and durability
  • 4Comes with Cylindrical Bamboo Carrying Case & Micro-Fiber Travel Pouch
  • 5Modern Approach to a Timeless Classic: Combining locally sourced American Black Walnut Temples with eco-friendly acetate frames, our wooden sunglasses offer a modern take on a timeless classic for a signature style that will help you stand out and get noticed.

The Toughest Lenses Around

Our hybrid walnut wood classic sunglasses are fitted with industry-leading CR39 polarized lenses. That means 100% UVA/UVB protection, superior scratch resistant protection and anti-glare coatings for unrivaled clarity in the brightest conditions.

Super Durable, Super Flexible & Super Comfortable Design

Thanks to the stainless steel flex hinges, our wooden sunglasses are built to last. The flex-hinges provide the perfect fit for any head size, making them so comfortable that you might forget you’re wearing them.

Customer Questions and Answers

  • Are the sunglasses really made of wood?

    • Yes, every pair of WUDN wood sunglasses are made from real wood.

    • Are the glasses one size fits all?

      • Yes, WUDN sunglasses are one size fits all. Some of our glasses are larger than others. For instance, the skateboard glasses run a bit larger and look best on men.

      • Are the glasses Ray-Ban?

        • WUDN sunglasses are not Ray-Ban's, although we do stick to the classic style both in terms of the size and the design.

        • Should I worry about rain? How waterproof are these glasses?

          • The glasses are completely waterproof. I wore them in the pool. You don't have to worry about them getting wet.

          • Should I get a matching wood phone case?

            • Of course. Your new wooden sunglasses would look fantastic with a matching bamboo phone case for your iPhone or Samsung Galaxy phone.

            • Are the lenses polarized?

              • Yes, every pair of WUDN wood sunglasses comes with polarized lenses. All of our natural wooden sunglasses are fitted with industry-leading CR39 polarized lenses. That’s 100% UVA/UVB protection, superior scratch resistant and anti-glare coatings for crystal clear vision in even the brightest conditions.

              • Are polarized lenses helpful and should I pay more for them?

                • If you spend most of your time outdoors, on the road, on the golf course, fishing, hunting, on the water or in the mountains, polarized lenses are worth every penny.

                • Can I take them to my optometrist and have the lenses changed to prescription lenses?

                  • On some models including our bamboo glasses, you can. But it would be at the optometrists discretion on whether or not to take install the new lenses. It would unfortunately void your product warranty as well.

                  • Are the lenses plastic or glass?

                    • The lenses are impact resistant polycarbonate lenses, block 100% of UV rays and have anti-glare features.

                    • Are replacement lenses available?

                      • No, the glasses are typically one piece and don’t come with a replacement lens option.

                      • Does the bamboo cylinder case come with the glasses?

                        • Yes, the bamboo cylinder comes with the glasses. People love the case and often use it for other purposes.

                        • Do the glasses come with a micro-fiber carry bag that doubles as a lens cleaner?

                          • Yes. And what a perfectly formed question.

Details:

Frank Lloyd Wright (1867-1959) is recognized worldwide as one of the greatest architects of the twentieth century. His work heralded a new thinking in architecture, using innovation in design and engineering made possible by newly developed technology and materials. His creative ability extended far beyond the border of architecture to graphic design, furniture, art glass, textiles, and decorative elements for the home. Frank Lloyd Wright thought the most beautiful light he ever saw was sunlight and moonlight filtered through leaves and branches. Inspired by nature, these original Frank Lloyd Wright designed lamps so perfectly capture the filtered glow of light he loved that he had five in his home in Taliesin. The lamp has (10) 15 Watt incandescent bulbs pre-installed as well as an on/off foot switch for easy power management. UL Approve Handcrafted by American artisans in Florence, Alabama and officially licensed by the Frank Lloyd Wright Foundation.

title: Royal Black Polyester Spandex Throw Blanket
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide

(4-7 Days)

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

Color: Black

Features:

  • POSSIBLY THE BIGGEST BLANKET EVER CREATED - Measuring in at a giant 11lbs and 10’ x 10’ (100 square feet!), this blanket is HUGE - nearly double the size of a standard king-size blanket or comforter - but it’s still machine washable in a standard sized washing machine.
  • A WHOLE NEW DEFINITION OF SOFT - Made of a specially formulated blend of polyester and spandex, this blanket is softer than sherpa blankets and fleece blankets while still temperature regulating, making the perfect fall blanket or warm blanket for the winter.
  • THE MOST VERSATILE COMFY BLANKET - Makes a great throw blanket for the couch to cuddle up and watch TV, a fantastic picnic blanket that can fit the whole family, or a throw blanket for the bed. And, most importantly, the Big Blanket transforms blanket forts into blanket CASTLES!
  • 100 NIGHT GUARANTEE - We're not satisfied unless you're totally happy and ridiculously cozy in your Big Blanket. If you don’t love the Big Blanket after spending 100 warm, cozy, nights with it, return it for a full refund.
  • THE BIG FLUFFY BLANKET THAT GQ CALLED: “Quite possibly the biggest, best blanket in the world.” - This is the blanket for binge watching, the throw for autumn nights, and a colossal campfire companion.

    Details: The blanket that changed the world, now ready to change your life. The Original Stretch is our best-selling 10' x 10' throw blanket, featuring a specially formulated blend of polyester and spandex with temperature regulating fabric so you don’t get too hot or cold. Perfect for: Netflix marathons, summer picnics, ultimate blanket forts. Made with a 4-way stretch, specially formulated polyester and spandex blend that’s 4x softer than standard throw blankets. It’s like the yoga pants of blankets. Taking care of your Big Blanket is easy. Simply throw it in any standard-sized washing machine. No need to dry clean or ask your mom to do it.
